DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate absorption , distribution , metabolism excretion ( ADME ) single dose [ 14C ] selumetinib volunteer
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating Absorption , Distribution , Metabolism Excretion ( ADME ) Single Dose 14C Selumetinib Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Provision sign date , write informed consent prior study specific procedure . Have body mass index ( BMI ) 18 32 kg/m2 inclusive weigh least 50 kg 100 kg , inclusive . Regular bowel movement ( ie , average production least 1 stool per day ) . Current past history central serous retinopathy retinal vein thrombosis , intraocular pressure great 21 mmHg uncontrolled glaucoma . Exposure radiation level background exceed 5 mSv last 12 month 10 mSv last 5 year . History presence clinically significant disease disorder opinion investigator Any clinically important abnormality clinical chemistry , haematology , urinalysis result , vital sign ECG baseline opinion Investigator .
